name: Empire of the Fallen Steel
description:
Empire of the Fallen Steel is a sci-fi action role-playing game, the player is able to join one of the four battling factions, assemble his own band of reinforced robots, lead them into battle, conquer cities and defeat the other factions.Features
- Free-form sand-box gameplay, conquer any city or faction
- Procedural generated cities
- Four factions to play each one with different abilities
- Lead and give orders to your robots in massive battles
- Economy driven gameplay
- Customizable cities
